title: A Stir of Bones
description: Susan Backstrom seems to have a charmed life - but she also has dangerous family secrets. When she hears some kids talking about exploring a nearby haunted house, Susan asks to join them, even though she knows what might happen if she gets caught. The teenagers discover that there is indeed a ghost, and the house itself is a living, supernatural thing. With the help of five new friends - three humans, one ghost, and House - Susan has what she needs to build a new life, if she dares.
author: Nina Kiriki Hoffman
